channel.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
channel.description:
Bakriminel Bolts Mami Rimba (friend of Papa Mambo) has set up shop just outside Edgeville. She’s every bit as mad as Papa but has delved into some seriously dark mojo. She’s tapped into the power of the bloodwood tree, which grows only in places of bloodshed, such as the Wilderness, to craft a bolt that punishes mages. The bolts must be fired from a rune or chaotic crossbow, and they have powerful stats (125 ranged strength – with a Ranged requirement of 80). When used in PVP against those of a magical persuasion, they have additional benefits, including the ability to target specific areas of the body, with mighty special attacks, depending on whether you're aiming at the head, torso or legs! To make these bolts, you must purchase bolt tips from Mami and head into one of the blood-soaked regions where a bloodwood tree can be found. Fletching of the bolts must be performed at the tree and will require 85 Woodcutting and 93 Fletching.
New way of attacking is pretty cool.

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:42, topic:434898”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=537618.msg3936000#msg3936000 date=1331061318]

LOOKS LIKE SHIT
[/quote]

What helmet is that?

OMG it’s rune… That looks like something a mexican wrestler would wear.[/quote]lol yeah it looks horrible in low detail :o… other torso was better graphic wise in my opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: New Bolts and new way of ranging

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:46, topic:434898”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=537618.msg3932521#msg3932521 date=1330808459]

78/93 fletching. How joyful of a money sink this skill is…

Maple long bows… then use the money gained to burn.
[/quote]Meh, I’m focusing on speed for this. I can’t stand making maple longbows just because I know they are slower than yew longbows (which I’m stringing, by the way). I figured one of the fastest ways to get fletching done is to fletch ruby bolts and then make yew longbows with sacred clay knives. The bolts are a little tedious (not nearly as bad as they used to be), but its a quick(er) 153k xp a day since I only make 10k a day. But aside from that, the going is easy and I don’t mind the money going into it, I’m stopping with conventional methods at 83 and going straight to the Jadinko Lair

Focusing on speed at all is going to result in a loss in money. If you want to know skills that are far worse than that, check out oak versus mahogany for construction sometime, or green d’hide bodies versus black d’hide bodies for crafting. :P[/quote]I know, I used to craft Fletching isn’t supposed to be a money sink, but I guess I made it one so I could get to 93 before the bolts came out. I’m at 81 right now and used fletching potions at the Jadinko lair and underestimated how slow it would be to actually gather the sagaie shafts. As it turns out, making the shafts into sagaies nets a hefty ~500k xp, but actually gathering the materials slows it down to a crawling ~65k xp an hour, slower if you chop the mutated vines yourself considering you lose money buying them.

Welp, I guess I’ll be doing 10k maple longbows a day.

Read full topic
item.source: New Bolts and new way of ranging

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:22, topic:434898”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=537618.msg3932443#msg3932443 date=1330804910]

78/93 fletching. How joyful of a money sink this skill is…

Maple long bows… then use the money gained to burn.
[/quote]Meh, I’m focusing on speed for this. I can’t stand making maple longbows just because I know they are slower than yew longbows (which I’m stringing, by the way). I figured one of the fastest ways to get fletching done is to fletch ruby bolts and then make yew longbows with sacred clay knives. The bolts are a little tedious (not nearly as bad as they used to be), but its a quick(er) 153k xp a day since I only make 10k a day. But aside from that, the going is easy and I don’t mind the money going into it, I’m stopping with conventional methods at 83 and going straight to the Jadinko Lair :P[/quote]

Focusing on speed at all is going to result in a loss in money. If you want to know skills that are far worse than that, check out oak versus mahogany for construction sometime, or green d’hide bodies versus black d’hide bodies for crafting.

Read full topic

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:36, topic:434898”]Well thats because you were using leech ranged. Eagle Eye is better than that curse. Tbh don’t bother using curses pking unless you can use Soul Split or Turmoil, otherwise you’re better off with Piety, Rigour and Augury.

Oh yeah, you’re also only 93 ranged. You won’t get KOs that way.[/quote]
I was doing minigames, exts boost me to 118 range lol so 93 range is the same as 99 range + range pot if not more, I dds pk personally. Leach range is 10-5%(however its combined with leach defence which makes it useful still) worse or 15-20% worse if its the other range one. I’ve got soul split and turmoil lol, you mean piety or turmoil because people don’t like you using soul split so that’d be pointless. I know how to pk :L but if I was to range pk then I could still get kos as I’m 113+10.

Read full topic
item.source: New Bolts and new way of ranging

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Well thats because you were using leech ranged. Eagle Eye is better than that curse. Tbh don’t bother using curses pking unless you can use Soul Split or Turmoil, otherwise you’re better off with Piety, Rigour and Augury.

Oh yeah, you’re also only 93 ranged. You won’t get KOs that way.

Read full topic

[/quote]ikr dbow spec and void is like instant ko[/quote]
Not for mee, tried d bow the other day since i haven’t used one apart from this in years was using the range leach curse, elite void, exts, 93 range never got any decent hits only did like 15specs though.

item.title: New Bolts and new way of ranging
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:29, topic:434898”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=537618.msg3932564#msg3932564 date=1330809943]

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=537618.msg3932560#msg3932560 date=1330809820]

Jagex did this because of that one video, the unauthorized biography of the wild or something like that. They are gnna force skillers to venture out into the wildy to chop the special trees.
[/quote]I have the same concept on a rsps I have been working on when I am bored actually. Good money making/skill xp is in the wildy so both parties profit. Then in the normal area are quests/ minimum monkey making/slayer monsters ( some ) /less xp in skills . then in a skillers isle type of thing you need to be 10 combat or below to enter.

I hope they do more. I can jsut see Jagex now, “Hey we did one update, that should shut those pk clan nerds up”
[/quote]I read somewhere on the rs forums that the developers do plan to do more similar things eventually but they can’t post a date or something.

I wonder if they will drop stats on some weapons and make it so you can only do dclaw spec once.

No they won’t.

BECAUSE YOU’RE JAGEX AND KNOW EVERYTHING THEY WILL DO.[/quote]

BECAUSE IF JAGEX WANTED TO DECIDE TO ACTUALLY LISTEN TO PEOPLE WHO COMPLAIN ABOUT DRAGON CLAWS THEY WOULD HAVE CHANGED THE SPECIAL ATTACK YEARS AGO!!! ALSO CAPS LOCK IS WHAT ALL THE COOL KIDS USE NOW!

Read full topic
